title: Lsbcore
author: Lsbcore
content: we are launching a project and looking for affiliatesthe affiliate program is run by nftyou will get a  nft and get % based on usage of service .more details to people who are interested on this amazing project  on DM , sorry for bad english

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: Lsbcore on February 23, 2023, 03:59:41 PMwe are launching a project and looking for affiliatesthe affiliate program is run by nftyou will get a  nft and get % based on usage of service .more details to people who are interested on this amazing project  on DM , sorry for bad english Please try to be more clear, why do you need the affiliates for? and what do the affiliates earn for joining the protect?What kind of NFTs are you offering, and when you say, get a % based on usage of service what do you mean by that?not sure if you are looking for partners for your project that's totally different than looking for affiliates. So, please give us a better description of the project and what are you looking for.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Lsbcore on February 23, 2023, 03:59:41 PMthe affiliate program is run by nftyou will get a  nft and get % based on usage of service .more details to people who are interested on this amazing project  on DM , you should be a little more specific, what exactly are you offering?as a reward, you offer something that has no value nor is it known when it will even be worth it. you can't expect someone to put in their effort without any guarantee that it will be profitable.maybe I'm too sceptical, but the glory days of NFT are over.

comments.author: Lsbcore
comments.body: we are not offering a no value productprimary thing is the value and the use....but we are using nft to identity and make asset management easier
